title: Top Companies for Financial Strength; Apple, Microsoft and Alphabet head this list from the Management Top 250 ranking
text:
Four of the Management Top 250 companies in the top 10 for financial strength also rank among the top 10 overall: Microsoft at No. 1, Amazon.com Inc. at No. 2, Apple at No. 3 and Nvidia Corp. at No. 6. Two more are in the top 25 overall: Alphabet Inc. at No. 13 and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. at No. 25.

Several of the top companies for financial strength are also among the leaders in some of the other four main components of the overall ranking. Microsoft is in the top 10 among Management Top 250 companies for innovation, employee engagement and development and social responsibility. Nvidia is in the top 10 for customer satisfaction and ranks No 1 for employee engagement and development. Amazon ranks highest for innovation, and Apple made the top 10 in that category.

Nvidia is one of eight companies in the latest Management Top 250 designated as All-Stars for their strong performance in all five main components of the overall ranking.

Advanced Micro Devices is among those in the Management Top 250 with the 10 biggest gainsfrom the previous year in this category.

You can explore the full, detailed rankings here.
